entities.name: Tab Accounting (Accounting Information)
entities.main_function: Management of accounting/financial information for simplified contracts
entities.document_purpose: Analysis of how Tab Basic Information (Basic Information) affects Tab Accounting
entities.analysis_scope: When basic information is changed in Tab Basic Information → Direct impact on Tab Accounting data and options

entities.name: Tab Click Processing from Basic Information to Accounting
entities.section_title: Tab Click Processing from Basic Information to Accounting
entities.mermaid_diagram:
flowchart TD A[User clicks Tab Accounting] --> B[Retrieve sinkiSakuseiKbn from basic information] B --> C{sinkiSakuseiKbn
Tab switching allowed?} C -->|No| D[Tab switching not allowed] C -->|Yes| E[Retrieve KeiyakuStatusCd and hensyuMode from basic information] E --> F{Status analysis} F --> G[KeiyakuStatusCd = 00/99
hensyuMode = 0] F --> H[KeiyakuStatusCd ≠ 00/99
hensyuMode = 0] F --> I[hensyuMode = 1] G --> J[keiriInitAction
keiyakuNewtmp/keiri.jsp] H --> K[keiriLockInitAction
keiyakuLock/keiri.jsp] I --> L[keiriHenkouInitAction
keiyakuHenkou/keiri.jsp] style A fill:#e1f5fe style D fill:#ffcdd2 style J fill:#f3e5f5 style K fill:#f3e5f5 style L fill:#f3e5f5

entities.name: **Contract Information Update**
entities.database_impact: Updated in database with new information
entities.action_impact: KeiriInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Displays new contract number in Tab Accounting, updates contract classification information

entities.name: **Contract Type Change**
entities.database_impact: Updated in database with new contract type
entities.action_impact: KeiriInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Changes product classification list according to contract type, updates dropdown options

entities.name: **Case Information Update**
entities.database_impact: Updated in database with new case information
entities.action_impact: KeiriInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Displays case name in Tab Accounting, case classification affects tax options

entities.name: **Office Change**
entities.database_impact: Updated in database with new office
entities.action_impact: KeiriInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Changes contract and product classification lists according to office, updates dropdown options

entities.name: **Customer Management**
entities.database_impact: Updated in database with new customer information
entities.action_impact: KeiriInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Displays customer information in Tab Accounting, may affect tax calculations and discounts

entities.name: **Important Date Update**
entities.database_impact: Updated in database with new dates
entities.action_impact: KeiriInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Contract conclusion date affects tax calculations, accounting date affects financial reporting

entities.name: Tab Cancellation (Cancellation Information)
entities.main_function: Management of information related to cancellation and changes of simplified contracts
entities.document_purpose: Analyze the impact of Tab Basic Information (Basic Information) on Tab Cancellation
entities.analysis_scope: When changing basic information in Tab Basic Information → Direct impact on Tab Cancellation data and options

entities.name: Tab Click Processing from Basic Information to Cancellation
entities.section_title: Tab Click Processing from Basic Information to Cancellation
entities.mermaid_diagram:
flowchart TD A[User clicks Tab Cancellation] --> B[Get sinkiSakuseiKbn from Basic Information] B --> C{sinkiSakuseiKbn
Tab switching allowed?} C -->|No| D[Tab switching not allowed] C -->|Yes| E[Get KeiyakuStatusCd and hensyuMode from Basic Information] E --> F{Status Analysis} F --> G[KeiyakuStatusCd = 00/99
hensyuMode = 0] F --> H[KeiyakuStatusCd ≠ 00/99
hensyuMode = 0] F --> I[hensyuMode = 1] G --> J[canceljyouhouInitAction
keiyakuNewtmp/canceljyouhou.jsp] H --> K[canceljyouhouLockInitAction
keiyakuLock/canceljyouhou.jsp] I --> L[canceljyouhouHenkouInitAction
keiyakuHenkou/canceljyouhou.jsp] style A fill:#e1f5fe style D fill:#ffcdd2 style J fill:#f3e5f5 style K fill:#f3e5f5 style L fill:#f3e5f5

entities.name: **Contract Information Update**
entities.action_impact: CanceljyouhouInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Displays new contract information on Tab Cancellation, updates contract number and basic information

entities.name: **Contract Type Change**
entities.database_impact: Database updated with new contract type
entities.action_impact: CanceljyouhouInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Changes cancellation reason list according to contract type, updates dropdown options

entities.name: **Case Information Update**
entities.database_impact: Database updated with new case information
entities.action_impact: CanceljyouhouInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Displays case name on Tab Cancellation, updates construction address

entities.name: **Branch Office Change**
entities.database_impact: Database updated with new branch office
entities.action_impact: CanceljyouhouInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Changes manufacturer list according to branch office, updates dropdown options

entities.name: **Important Date Update**
entities.action_impact: CanceljyouhouInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Contract conclusion date affects cancellation information, updates accounting date

entities.name: **Customer Management**
entities.database_impact: Database updated with new customer information
entities.action_impact: CanceljyouhouInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Displays customer information on Tab Cancellation, updates form fields

entities.name: Tab Order (Order Information)
entities.document_purpose: Analyze how Tab Basic Information (Basic Information) affects Tab Order
entities.analysis_scope: When Basic Information is changed in Tab Basic Information → Direct impact on Tab Order data and options

entities.name: Tab Click Processing from Basic Information to Order
entities.section_title: Tab Click Processing from Basic Information to Order
entities.mermaid_diagram:
flowchart TD A[User clicks Tab Order] --> B[Get sinkiSakuseiKbn from Basic Information] B --> C{sinkiSakuseiKbn
Tab switch allowed?} C -->|No| D[Tab switching not permitted] C -->|Yes| E[Get KeiyakuStatusCd and hensyuMode from Basic Information] E --> F{Status Analysis} F --> G[KeiyakuStatusCd = 00/99
hensyuMode = 0] F --> H[KeiyakuStatusCd ≠ 00/99
hensyuMode = 0] F --> I[hensyuMode = 1] G --> J[jyutyuInitAction
keiyakuNewtmp/jyutyu.jsp] H --> K[jyutyuLockInitAction
keiyakuLock/jyutyu.jsp] I --> L[jyutyuHenkouInitAction
keiyakuHenkou/jyutyu.jsp] style A fill:#e1f5fe style D fill:#ffcdd2 style J fill:#f3e5f5 style K fill:#f3e5f5 style L fill:#f3e5f5

entities.name: **Contract Information Update**
entities.action_impact: JyutyuInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Tab Order displays new customer information, project information updated

entities.name: **Customer Management**
entities.database_impact: Database updated with new customer information
entities.action_impact: JyutyuInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Tab Order displays new/changed customer information, form fields updated with new information

entities.name: **Customer Deletion**
entities.action_impact: JyutyuInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Deleted customer not displayed in Tab Order, related form fields cleared

entities.name: **Main/Sub Customer Setting**
entities.action_impact: JyutyuInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Tab Order displays correct main/sub customers, display order changed according to new classification

entities.name: **Project Information Update**
entities.database_impact: Database updated with new project information
entities.action_impact: JyutyuInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Tab Order displays project name, construction address updated

entities.name: **Sales Office Change**
entities.database_impact: Database updated with new sales office
entities.action_impact: JyutyuInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: System checks project integration data, Tab Order displays new sales office information

entities.name: **Important Date Update**
entities.action_impact: JyutyuInitAction retrieves new data from database
entities.ui_impact: Contract signing date affects order, order date updated
